Package drcl.net.graph

Class Summary
AdjMatrixVis  
Area  
Graph  
Link The class defines data structure that describes an "edge" of a graph.
Node  
Relaxer Given a graph, iterates to get to the equilibrium point where forces by edge length and "push" by nodes are balanced.
ShortestPathTree This class implements the Dijkstra algorithm and calculates the minimum shortest path tree for a graph.
TopologyParser Converts an adjacency matrix to topology data structure.
TopologyReader Reads topology from a file and saves in Graph.
TopologyReaderAlt  
TopologyReaderBrite  
TopologyVisRelaxer Plots the graph changed by Relaxer.
